title: Workshop on Scientific Reasoning Assessment Tool Design and Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Training in assessment item development using mobile-optimized tools (e.g., smartphone-based VR simulations, Google Forms) in limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can develop assessment items measuring eight sub-elements of scientific reasoning (experimental design, data interpretation, etc.).
Learners can design assessment tools applying psychometric validation procedures (reliability, validity analysis).
Learners can analyze scientific reasoning assessment data collected via mobile devices in a VR simulation environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
